com.karusmc.xmc.core

Class XMCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.command.Command
      • com.karusmc.xmc.core.XMCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.command.PluginIdentifiableCommand
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboutCommand, ConfigurableCommand, DispatchCommand, HelpCommand, ParserRegister

    public abstract class XMCommand
extends org.bukkit.command.Command
implements org.bukkit.command.PluginIdentifiableCommand
    Represents a Command, which executes various tasks upon user input. Includes fields for enabling and disabling console command execution.

        Executes the command.
        Parameters:
